column6:
X-Factor is trapped in the middle: On the one side, the population of Ex-Mutant Town is in danger of boiling over as the X-Cell, apparently re-empowered by Pietro, endeavor to rally the rank and file against X-Factor. On the other side, the government, ready to move in with everything from armies to Sentinels. Will Madrox decide to tell the truth behind M-Day...and will anyone believe him?,2007,5
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Peter David | inker:Sandu Florea | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Khoi Pham | colorist:Brian Reber | penciller (cover):Andrea Di Vito
